item.title: Recursion
item.description: It was alright overall. The idea of using memory as a type of time travel is interesting, but I feel that it got repetitive and I think the climax was way too early. Or at least, the climax near the was not big enough. I also don’t understand why Helena had to go back 33 years each time, that’s wild. They could have gone back five or so years before everything was addled and tried again. The ending was nice and emotional.
